testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to update Delivery man information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: admin DELIVERY When a PATCH request with valid authorization and correct data (name, mobile, email,
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/deliveryman/edit" path parameters..................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing "Delivery Man 748", "12589634780", "dvman@deliveryman.com", "Atlanta", "100.00", "200.00" and "30.00" information to send to the api parceledit endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Updated"..passed * The api user verifies that the "Delivery Man" "id" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the "data[0].user.name" is "Delivery Man 748" by sending a GET request to the "api" "deliveryman" endpoint with the "Delivery Man" "id" returned in the response body..passed
